mapper.insert: insert into record( id, equipment_exercise_id, sett, weight, countt, start_time, end_time ) values( #{id}, #{equipmentExerciseId}, #{sett}, #{weight}, #{countt}, #{startTime}, #{endTime} )
mapper.update: update record set id = #{id}, equipment_exercise_id = #{equipmentExerciseId}, sett = #{sett}, weight = #{weight}, countt = #{countt}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime} where record_id = #{recordId}
mapper.select: SELECT record.record_id as record_id, record.id as id, record.equipment_exercise_id as equipment_exercise_id, record.sett as sett, record.weight as weight, record.countt as countt, record.start_time as start_time, record.end_time as end_time FROM user, record where user.username = #{name} and user.id = record.id;

SELECT record.record_id as record_id, record.id as id, record.equipment_exercise_id as equipment_exercise_id, record.sett as sett, record.weight as weight, record.countt as countt, record.start_time as start_time, record.end_time as end_time FROM user, record where user.username = #{name} and user.id = record.id and year(record.start_time) = year(now()) and month(record.start_time) = month(now()) and day(record.start_time) = day(now());

SELECT record.record_id as record_id, record.id as id, record.equipment_exercise_id as equipment_exercise_id, record.sett as sett, record.weight as weight, record.countt as countt, record.start_time as start_time, record.end_time as end_time FROM user, equipment, equipment_exercise, record where user.username = #{username} AND equipment.equipment_id = #{equipmentId} AND equipment.equipment_id = equipment_exercise.equipment_id AND equipment_exercise.equipment_id = record.equipment_exercise_id AND user.id = record.id;

SELECT exercise.name as name, record.sett as sett, record.weight as weight, record.countt as countt, record.start_time as start_time, record.end_time as end_time FROM user, record, equipment_exercise, exercise where user.username = #{username} and user.id = record.id and record.equipment_exercise_id = equipment_exercise.equipment_exercise_id and equipment_exercise.exercise_id = exercise.exercise_id;
